entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
